sections.paragraph: + Son of Ishar the son of Kohath. (Exodus 6:21) (B.C. 1401.) + A Benjamite of the sons of Shimhi. (1 Chronicles 8:19) (B.C. 1440.) + A Benjamite of the sons of Shashak. (1 Chronicles 8:23) + A Benjamite of the sons of Jeroham. (1 Chronicles 8:27) + Son of Asaph, elsewhere called [1338]Zabdi and ZACCUB. (1 Chronicles 9:15) + A descendant of Eliezer the son of Moses. (1 Chronicles 26:25) (B.C. before 1043.) + The father of Eliezer, the chief of the Reubenites in the reign of David. (1 Chronicles 27:16) (B.C. before 1043.) + One of the tribe of Judah, father of Amasiah. (2 Chronicles 11:16) + Father of Elishaphat, one of the conspirators with Jehoiada. (2 Chronicles 23:1) (B.C. before 876.) + An Ephraimite hero in the invading army of Pekah the son of Remaliah. (2 Chronicles 28:7) (B.C. 734.) + Father or ancestor of [1339]Joel, 14. (Nehemiah 11:9) + A priest of the family of Abijah, in the days of Joiakim the son of Jeshua. (Nehemiah 12:17) (B.C. 480.)
